summary: Provides a utility class that aggregates simple helper methods for performing common post‑processing calculations in ANSYS MAPDL, such as computing coefficient factors, extracting force values, handling layer and shell parameters, and evaluating temperature variations.
business_intent: Enable users of the ANSYS MAPDL Python interface to quickly obtain routine post‑processing results without manual scripting, thereby streamlining analysis workflows and reducing the effort required to retrieve engineering quantities.
